Listly

Listly

Using Backbone.js I built Listly to demonstrate basic C.R.U.D. capabilities and the movement of data models between collections. This is a fun little list management app that also demonstrates some click animations and responsive layout techniques. Get in there and create some items and move them around and destroy them, it may feel like you’re being productive :) Also, don’t judge me for the color palette, the late 80’s and early 90’s are still alive in my mind.
